Uses of Interface
falstad.Viewer

  • Packages that use Viewer 
    Package Description
    falstad  

    • Uses of Viewer in falstad

      Classes in falstad that implement Viewer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultViewer
      This is a default implementation of the Viewer interface with methods that do nothing but providing debugging output such that subclasses of this class can selectively overwrite those methods that are truly needed.
      class  FirstPersonDrawer
      This class encapsulates all functionality for drawing the current view at the maze from a first person perspective.
      class  MapDrawer
      This class encapsulates all functionality to draw a map of the overall maze, the set of visible walls, the solution.
      class  MazeView
      Implements the screens that are displayed whenever the game is not in the playing state.
      Methods in falstad with parameters of type Viewer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MazeController.addView(Viewer view)
      Register a view
      void MazeController.removeView(Viewer view)
      Unregister a view
